MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra met a 'Courtesan|hetaera' who, by her claim, was to marry The Monger before his death at Kassandra's hand. Kassandra claimed another mercenary was responsible and was hired to kill them.'

General_Description: '''Grieving Widow To Be''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following the death of [[The Monger]], Kassandra ran into a [[Courtesan|''hetaera'']] who wished to see his killer slain.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's happened?'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''I know you killed the Monger, you home-wrecking'' malákas. |-|Yes, I did kill the Monger.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're right. I killed that pig so everyone could see.'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''That ''pig'' was my husband-to-be. And because of you, I'm destined to be a ''[[Courtesan|hetaera]]'' for my entire life and die an old maid.
You've killed any chance I had at a normal life.'' (Quest failed) |-|The Monger was destroying Korinthia.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't understand why you're so upset. The Monger was running [[Korinthia]] into the ground.'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''Who cares about Korinthia?! I care about my own fucking life that you've ruined. He was going to marry me. Me! How many chances do you think a ''[[Courtesan|hetaera]]'' gets in a lifetime?'' (Quest failed) |-|(Lie) No, I didn't kill the Monger.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I... don't know what you're talking about.'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''If it wasn't you who killed my husband-to-be, you're going to find the fucker who did. I want you to go out there and kill the [[mercenary]] that slit his throat.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you need me to send him to [[Hades]]?'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''That's exactly it. The mercenary must die.'' (Accept - I'll kill the mercenary.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''Good. You're doing me a great service.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.'' Kassandra set out to find the mercenary, and dealt with them before returning to the ''hetaera''. *'''Hetaera:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.'' *'''Hetaera:''' ''You've set great things in motion. Take this as thanks.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra hunted down the mercenary and killed them.
Section_Trivia: *This quest is triggered by choosing to kill The Monger publicly at the theater in [[Monger Down]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
